name: 林志哲

自動化機械簡介，規劃及設計，驅動器，感測器可程式控制，氣液壓迴路控制，電腦介面控制，自動化系統實例介紹及應用。
Introduction, design and planning for Automatic machine, Actuators sensors,  PLC, pneumatic control, PC-based control, Examples for Automatic system and its application.

Week 13 Relay and PLC
Week 14 Relay and PLC
